question: The change in hybridization (if any) of the 'Al' atom in the following reaction is
<katex>$\text{AlCl}_3 + \text{Cl}^- \rightarrow \text{AlCl}_4^-$</katex>
choices: No change in the hybridization state
explanation: <katex>$\text{AlCl}_3$</katex> has 3 bond pairs, 0 lone pairs -> <katex>$sp^2$</katex> (Trigonal planar).
